channel.description: Week 5 Announcements GTAs Sumaira, Akhil, Pavan Office Hours M-Thu 4-6 PM Double Coverage Tues & Thurs Additional UTA Office Hours Email & Ed Stem Rolling Enrollment Welcome New Teachers! Enroll through mid-March No Late Penalties Easy Incomplete Grades Deadlines Not Enforced Advice Make steady progress Try to do something each week Stuck? Ask for Help! Questions & Ideas Welcome Upcoming Summer & Fall Enrollment Summer Workshop June 6 - 7 KS CSTA Conference June 8 Curriculum Requests & Rollout Enrollment CC 710 & CC 711 -> EDCI 765 Summer CC 730 Fall CC 730 -> CC 750 Fall EDCI 768 or 769 Spring Tuition Payments Ongoing!
